meanings.definition: A person who is a member of the same club as another.
meanings.sent1: My clubmate and I play tennis together every Saturday.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy chatting with my clubmate during our meetings.
meanings.sent3: When my clubmate wore mismatched socks to the club, we all had a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: Being a clubmate is like having a built-in support system.
meanings.sent5: My clubmate's dedication to the club is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: A friend or companion who is a member of the same club.
meanings.sent1: My clubmate and I share a love for gardening.
meanings.sent2: It's great to have a clubmate who always has my back.
meanings.sent3: My clubmate surprised me with a funny dance at the club's party.
meanings.sent4: Having a loyal clubmate is like having a partner in crime.
meanings.sent5: My clubmate's positivity always brightens my day.

meanings.definition: To join or associate with a clubmate.
meanings.sent1: I decided to clubmate with my neighbor to join the book club.
meanings.sent2: She clubmated with her colleague to participate in the charity event.
meanings.sent3: We should clubmate and organize a fun event for the club.
meanings.sent4: Let's clubmate and make our club even stronger.
meanings.sent5: Clubmating with others can lead to new and exciting experiences.
